review: One treatment of Keytruda  finished off my Husband within 3 months. The doctors tried steroids to stop keytruda effects, but nothing worked. Doctor did not even type his liver cancer before giving keytruda.

I did five treatments with keytruda and my tumors were stable up until the 5th where they doubled in size so  I immediately stop keytruda.  Now  I am currently taking lenvima 10 mg pill once per day we'll see how that works out not very hopeful though seems like I'm running out of options.
